name: farming-grants-docs
description: A repository of documentation concerning farming grants

scripts.generate: npm run generate:diagrams && npm run generate:so:pptx && npm run generate:so:html
scripts.generate:diagrams: find docs -path "docs/lib" -prune -o -name "*.puml" -print | xargs -I {} npx water-uml export {} -l -d 8088
scripts._publish: mark -u $ATLASSIAN_USERNAME -p $ATLASSIAN_API_TOKEN -b https://eaflood.atlassian.net/wiki/  -f "./docs/**/*.md" --space FFG --title-from-h1 --parents "Future Farming Grants Technical Documentation"
